pageProduct.name: Systane Gel Lubricating Drops 10ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Systane Lubricant Eye Gel Drops are long lasting day or night protection for intensive dry eye relief.

Size: 10mL

Warnings

See package insert for complete instructions and important safety information.
People allergic to any ingredient in Systane (a trademark of Novartis) Gel Lubricant Eye Gel should not use this product.
It is essential that you follow your eye care practitioner's directions and all labelling instructions for proper use of the product. If you experience persistent eye discomfort, excessive tearing, vision changes, or redness of the eye, consult your eye care practitioner as the problem could become more serious.
Keep out of reach of children.
Do not swallow the solution.
Sterile until opened.
To avoid contamination, never touch dropper tip of container to any surface. Replace cap after use.
Keep container tightly closed when not in use.
Use before the expiry date marked on the product.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Tamper Evident: Do not use if tamper evident cap is damaged. Do not use if package has been opened or damaged.

Ingredients

Systane (a trademark of Novartis) Gel Lubricant Eye Gel is a sterile solution containing Polyethylene Glycol 400, Propylene Glycol, Hydroxypropyl Guar, Sorbitol, Aminomethylpropanol, Boric Acid, Potassium Chloride, Sodium Chloride, Edetate Disodium, and Polyquad (a trademark of Novartis) (Polyquaternium-1) 0.001% Preservative.

Contains: Polyethylene Glycol 400 0.4% w/v, Propylene Glycol 0.3% w/v

Directions

Store below 30°C.
Discard any remaining product three months after first opening.

Storage Temperature: bBelow 30°C.
